title: Docs: add plain-English summary to README + paper bundle
description: Add a Gemini-style but accurate plain-English narrative to the root README and the paper bundle README.

title: Add paper-style stats: SEs, DiD table, welfare
description: Extend experiment outputs with replication-level standard errors, difference-in-differences estimands, and a net welfare metric that penalizes attention/communication.
close_reason: Added SEs for arm outcomes, DiD effects table with SEs, and net welfare metrics; reports/latest updated.

title: FieldSim v2: realistic dynamics + pricing + misrep + spillovers + scaling
description: Upgrade the simulation to include dynamic matching (time, cancellations, rematching), pricing/negotiation, strategic misrepresentation, imperfect AI + user edits (compliance), multi-cell spillovers (shared providers), and scaling analysis; generate paper-ready tables/plots + datasets.
close_reason: Completed: FieldSim v2 calibrated + report generated

title: Implement GPT-5.2 elicitation + parsing agent
description: Add an LLM client that loads OPENAI_* from .env and implements (a) standard-form parsing and (b) conversational elicitation that outputs structured JSON preferences.
close_reason: Implemented GPT-5.2 batch elicitation/parser with caching + call budget; llm-live test passes.

title: Simulate publishable field experiment with cluster randomization
description: Add a paper-style simulation that assigns 2x2 arms at the cell level (city×category×week), computes observable acceptance-based describability proxies, and outputs regression-style tables + plots + a synthetic dataset for analysis.

title: Build simulation: two-sided market + mechanisms + metrics
description: Implement synthetic marketplace generator, preference-density proxy computation, and 2x2 arms (elicitation x mechanism) with communication costs and welfare metrics.
close_reason: Implemented synthetic two-sided market, preference-density proxy, decentralized search + centralized recommendations mechanisms.

title: Docs: add references / citations
description: Add a small References section to README that cites the in-repo paper (Shi, SSRN 3536086) and a few key related marketplace design papers mentioned there.

title: Run experiment + generate table/plots + README report
description: Create a reproducible runner that executes the 2x2 experiment, writes a summary table and plots, and documents how to reproduce and interpret results.
close_reason: Ran 2x2 experiment and generated report table + SVG plots in reports/latest/.

title: Scaffold project: Makefile + pyproject + interface targets
description: Create minimal Python project scaffolding and Interface Contract commands (setup/check/test/all/llm-live) using uv, ruff/pytest/coverage, plus basic folder structure.
close_reason: Project scaffold + Interface Contract targets implemented; make all passes.

title: Initialize git repo (ignore .env/pdf) + publish
description: Set up a git repository, add safe ignore rules, keep reports tracked, and push to GitHub.

title: Add regime map sweep over describability (k_I × k_J)
description: Run a grid over elicitation depth for each side and plot where centralized recommendations dominate search (net welfare). Output CSV + SVG heatmap.
close_reason: Implemented k_I×k_J regime sweep and SVG heatmap output; make regime writes reports/latest/regime_* artifacts.

title: Strengthen simulation credibility: top-3 baseline, LLM calibration+ablations, robustness sweeps, rational congestion
description: Address reviewer-style critiques: remove strawman standard baseline, add ablations separating information collected vs LLM parsing vs agent elicitation, add sensitivity/robustness across key knobs and seeds, and make congestion providers minimally rational/adaptive.

title: Verisimilitude + calibration: realistic intakes + moment matching
description: Add (1) realistic home-services task taxonomy and natural-language intake generation (standard form + messy free text + agent chat), (2) a lightweight moment-calibration harness for FieldSim v2 (targets: price, cancel rate, match rate, messages/inbox), and (3) regenerate all reports so the thesis still holds under calibrated, more realistic primitives.

title: Docs: rename narrative heading
description: Rename the README narrative section headings to avoid the phrase 'Plain-English'.

title: Experiment 2: delegated outreach agents + saturation congestion
description: Implement a realistic home-services marketplace context with capacity constraints and a saturation design for delegated outreach agents; generate tables + plots showing congestion externalities and optimal adoption.

title: Paper-ready bundle: rerun + consolidated report
description: Regenerate key simulation reports/plots, tighten intake verisimilitude, and produce a single consolidated README/table for academic+practitioner consumption.

title: Docs + regime map: emphasize λ* threshold framing
description: Strengthen documentation and plots: add regime-map ROI boundary (lambda*) outputs, update paper bundle to foreground conditional regime shift framing, and refresh tables/plots.

title: Housekeeping: remove @AGENTS.md; review money modeling
description: Remove duplicate @AGENTS.md and review barter_to_money work to decide if any additional monetary modeling is warranted; update docs/code and rerun gates.
